info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 3:25PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Blaine County through 400 PM MDT... At 323 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fort Belknap, or 21 miles east of Chinook, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Torrential rain, winds in excess of 30 mph, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Localized flooding and gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Harlem and Fort Belknap. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
